name: Blu Bandana
description:
Blu Bandana is a small jumper clicker fast paced ninja game in which you must be as quick as a real ninja to reach only certain checkpoints while avoiding others.

WHAT TO EXPECT?

Well, there is only one character in this game and that is Blu. Blu is a ninja with a special training in mind - achieve perfect balance between black and white, yin and yang. This is exactly what your mission is going to be here - pass through all the stages and achieve perfect balance in each one.

LEVELS

As far as levels go, there is a huge number of stages which means that there is also a lot of levels. But don't worry, a true ninja can never be tired for another challenge.

Pass each level by only using a jump key and nothing else. Yes, it's possible! Pass your training and help Blu become a true jump ninja.
